sourcesContent:
{{window}}
{{LangData('cover')}}
{{LangData('abouttrack')}}
{{LangData('artist')}}: {{currentTrack.common.artist || '???'}}
{{LangData('name')}}: {{currentTrack.common.title || '???'}}
{{LangData('album')}}: {{currentTrack.common.album || '???'}}
{{LangData('min')}}: {{formatDuration(currentTrack.common.duration)}}
{{LangData('year')}}: {{currentTrack.common.year || '???'}}
{{LangData('genre')}}: {{currentTrack.common?.genre || ''}}
{{LangData('trackinalbum')}}: {{currentTrack.common.track.no ? currentTrack.common.track.no : '??'}} / {{currentTrack.common?.track?.of || '??'}}
CD â„–: {{currentTrack.common.disk.no ? currentTrack.common.disk.no : '??'}} / {{currentTrack.common?.disk?.of || '??'}}
{{LangData('rating')}}: {{currentTrack.common.rating ? (currentTrack.common.rating * 10) : '??'}} / 10
{{LangData('lyrics')}}:
{{currentTrack.common?.lyrics || '- - -'}}
ðŸŽ¶
{{(currentTrack) ? (currentTrack.common.artist + ' - ' + currentTrack.common.title) : '- - -'}}
{{currentTrack_time}} / {{(TrackTime && TrackTime.duration !== 0) ? ShowerTime(TrackTime.duration) : '00:00'}}
{{(VolumeLvl > 0) ? (VolumeLvl * 100) : '00'}}%
[] â„– {{ShowConfig.playlist.artist ? LangData('artist') : LangData('artist')[0]}} {{ShowConfig.playlist.album ? LangData('album') : LangData('album')[0]}} {{LangData('name')}} {{ShowConfig.playlist.duration ? LangData('min') : LangData('min')[0]}}
{{index + 1}} {{ShowConfig.playlist.artist ? (track.common.artist ? track.common.artist : '--') : ''}} {{ShowConfig.playlist.album ? (track.common.album ? track.common.album : '--') : ''}} {{track.common.title ? track.common.title : 'unknown'}} {{ShowConfig.playlist.duration ? (track.common.duration ? formatDuration(track.common.duration) : '--:--') : ''}}
{{LangData('totaltracks')}}: {{PlayList.length}} {{LangData('duration')}}: {{(durationAll && durationAll > 0) ? formatDuration(durationAll) : '--:--'}}
